last_episode_to_air.name: Phantasm Forgiveness
last_episode_to_air.overview: Past, present and future collide as Truman makes a final push to finish Answered Prayers.

name: FEUD
overview: Anthology series of famous feuds with the first season based on the legendary rivalry between Bette Davis and Joan Crawford which began early on their careers, climaxed on the set of "Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?" and evolved into an Oscar vendetta.

seasons.name: Bette and Joan
seasons.overview: The story of the legendary rivalry between Bette Davis and Joan Crawford which began early on their careers, climaxed on the set of "Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?" and evolved into an Oscar vendetta.

seasons.name: Capote vs. the Swans
seasons.overview: Truman Capote surrounded himself with some of society's most elite women, whom he nicknamed "the swans," but his act of betrayal destroyed those relationships, banished him from high society and sent him into a spiral of self-destruction.

tagline: The best stories happen behind the scenes.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Cast aside by Hollywood, screen legends Joan Crawford and Bette Davis battle ageism, sexism and each other when they sign up to make "Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?"

episodes.name: The Other Woman
episodes.overview: With production on the film underway, Bette and Joan form an alliance, but outside forces conspire against them.

episodes.name: Mommie Dearest
episodes.overview: As the film production reaches its climax, the feud becomes physical. Bette's relationship with her daughter becomes strained when she bonds with a new cast member. Joan reveals an intimate detail about her past.

episodes.name: More, or Less
episodes.overview: Bad word-of-mouth plagues "What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?" on the eve of its release. Bette and Joan brace for failure. Pauline tries to break gender barriers. Oscar nominations are announced.

episodes.name: And the Winner Is... (The Oscars of 1963)
episodes.overview: Bette is on track to win a record-breaking, third "Best Actress" Oscar. Joan and Hedda launch a clandestine campaign against Bette.

episodes.name: Hagsploitation
episodes.overview: Hungry for another hit, Warner pressures Aldrich to bring the original team back together for a follow-up hag horror pic. Someone from Joan's past poses a threat.

episodes.name: Abandoned!
episodes.overview: With production of Hushâ€¦Hush Sweet Charlotte underway, the feud is intensified when Joan learns of a new producer on the project. In an unguarded moment, Bette reveals her vulnerabilities to Bob.

episodes.name: You Mean All This Time We Could Have Been Friends?
episodes.overview: In the season finale, Joan accepts a leading role on a new film despite her deteriorating health. Faced with a new rival, Bette reflects on her misplaced feud with Joan.

1.name: Bette and Joan
1.overview: The story of the legendary rivalry between Bette Davis and Joan Crawford which began early on their careers, climaxed on the set of "Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?" and evolved into an Oscar vendetta.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Truman Capote is the toast of New York society. But a dishy excerpt published in Esquire Magazine threatens to topple him from his precarious perch.

episodes.name: Ice Water in Their Veins
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the Esquire article, Truman starts on a downward spiral. The Swans form a unified front.

episodes.name: Masquerade 1966
episodes.overview: In 1966, documentary filmmakers the Maysles brothers capture the events leading up to and following Truman's iconic Black and White Ball.

episodes.name: It's Impossible
episodes.overview: Babe makes peace with a harsh reality. Truman makes an effort to get sober.

episodes.name: The Secret Inner Lives of Swans
episodes.overview: November 1975, the day after the Esquire article is published, Truman receives an inspiring visit from a fellow writer.

episodes.name: Hats, Gloves and Effete Homosexuals
episodes.overview: In New York, it's the end of an era. In California, Truman tries to usher in a new era with a hunky beau.

episodes.name: Beautiful Babe
episodes.overview: Babe reflects on her life and her greatest treasures. Truman and the Swans reel in the fallout of a tragedy.

episodes.name: Phantasm Forgiveness
episodes.overview: Past, present and future collide as Truman makes a final push to finish Answered Prayers.

2.name: Capote vs. the Swans
2.overview: Truman Capote surrounded himself with some of society's most elite women, whom he nicknamed "the swans," but his act of betrayal destroyed those relationships, banished him from high society and sent him into a spiral of self-destruction.
